Portfolio

ChiSalary

  • Designed and developed an iOS application that allows users to view the salaries of employees employed by the City of Chicago.

  • Required Knowledge and Skills: iOS Development, Objective C, SQLite, Xcode, MVC Architecture, OOP, N-Tier Architecture, Teamwork

Arduino Home Security System

  • Programmed and constructed a security system that notifies both homeowners and neighbors via text message if there is an intruder entering homes in the neighborhood.

  • Required Knowledge and Skills: Arduino Hardware, C
